parameters: \N<Segi>I-I need to... I must go get the medicine quickly!

\N<Segi>No, I can't... I can't go out to the plaza dressed like
this...

\N<Man>The deeper you go into the ruins, the more vicious monsters
you'll encounter.

\N<Man>Even if you're doing it to train yourself, losing your life
gains you nothing... Please proceed with utmost caution.

\N<Man>It seems that the folks from Ryuda will treat the wounds
inflicted by the monsters lurking inside the ruins, but I
trust them even less than the monsters...

\N<Man>There are still many areas within the ruins that remain
unexplored. If you search every nook and cranny, you might
find something useful.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What are you looking at, got something to say? Maybe I
should tie you up in the dungeon before we talk, huh?
\N<Segi>I-I need to get the medicine... I must go get it quickly!
\N<Segi>I-I need to get the medicine... I must go get it quickly!
\N<Segi>I-I need to get the medicine... I must go get it quickly!

\N<Segi>(...To enter the ruins, I guess it has to be from here...
But I can't possibly go with Mr. Rozaro looking like
this...)
\N<Segi>N-no, it's just... I think I should go alone after all...

\N<Rozaro>...I don't know what makes you hesitate to have me accompany
you, but didn't I tell you that the inner parts of the ruins
he fled into are filled with numerous traps?
\N<Rozaro>If you were to fall to one of them, who would save Riia?

\N<Rozaro>The reason I will accompany you is to prioritize Riia's life
above all else. There's no other motive.

\N<Segi>Understood... In that case, may I ask you to wait here for a
moment...?
